title: Online Collaborative Learning Design for Mathematical Problem-Solving Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Cultivating collaborative learning design and implementation skills for mathematics problem-solving among professionals. Focuses on real-time collaboration tools and feedback exchange using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively derive math problem-solving strategies in randomly assigned groups of four
Learners can visualize and share problem-solving processes using online collaboration tools (e.g., digital whiteboards)
Learners can analyze the logical validity of solutions and propose improvements through peer assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
